name: mattgawarecki_hp-lovecraft
title: hp-lovecraft
description:
Many of the collected works of H.P. Lovecraft

# Summary
This dataset contains many of the publicly-available works of H.P. Lovecraft. All text was taken from the GitHub repository [`nathanielksmith/lovecraftcorpus`](https://github.com/nathanielksmith/lovecraftcorpus). Most of Lovecraft's works exist in the public domain and are not subject to copyright law.

The text contained herein has not been significantly cleaned or altered from its original state. As such, it may not be immediately useful in analytical contexts without further processing.

*Source of publication dates: [Wikisource](https://en.wikisource.org/wiki/Author:Howard_Phillips_Lovecraft)*
